mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CORRECTION_POST (CRP_NO, CRP_CONTENT, CRP_DATE, CRP_STATUS, MOUNTAIN_NO, MOUNTAIN_NAME, USER_NO) VALUES(seq_crp_no.NEXTVAL, #{contents}, SYSDATE, 0, #{mountainNo}, #{mountainName}, #{userNo})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CORRECTION_POST WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND CRP_NO = #{postNo}
mapper.select: SELECT crp.crp_no, crp.crp_content, crp.crp_date, crp.crp_status, m.MOUNTAIN_NO, m.MOUNTAIN_NAME, u.USER_NO FROM USERS u, CORRECTION_POST crp, MOUNTAIN m WHERE crp.USER_NO = u.USER_NO AND crp.MOUTAIN_NO = m.MOUNTAIN_NO
